cover_image.prompt: Create a wide cinematic scene based on the song '{{song_title}}'. Focus on {{symbolic_element_from_lyrics}} in {{setting}}. Mood: {{intro_tone}}. Lighting/Color: vibrant contrasts ({{neon_vs_dark}}). Typography (optional): '{{lyric_snippet_intro}}' integrated naturally (graffiti, billboard, carved surface). Aspect Ratio: 9:16 or 16:9.
cover_image.negative_prompt: Exclude: blurry, distorted faces, extra limbs, watermarks, generic stock-photo look.

transition.prompt: Zoom in on a symbolic object from the lyrics: {{lyric_object}}. Backdrop: blurred {{environment_detail}}. Mood: {{shift_in_emotion}}. Lighting/Color: muted or subtle with soft highlights. Typography: optional if lyric directly references this object. Aspect Ratio: 16:9 or 1:1.
transition.negative_prompt: Exclude: flat background, artifacts, generic icons.

main_image.prompt: Depict the core action or emotional highlight of the lyrics: {{character_state_or_action}}. Scene: {{narrative_scene}}. Lighting/Color: dramatic contrast ({{emotional_palette}}). Typography (optional): '{{lyric_snippet_chorus}}' embedded naturally (neon sign, glowing poster, wall graffiti). Aspect Ratio: 9:16 or 16:9.
main_image.negative_prompt: Exclude: overly cartoony style unless specified, duplicate characters.

filler.prompt: Focus on a symbolic detail from the lyrics: {{symbolic_detail}}. Mood: reflective / nostalgic. Lighting/Color: warm, golden tones with gentle shadows. Typography: only if subtle lyric reference enhances emotion. Aspect Ratio: 1:1 or 16:9.

next_scene_transition.prompt: Expand the view to show {{wider_environment}}. Scene transition toward {{next_stage_of_lyrics}}. Lighting/Color: pastel fades or muted blues, suggesting change or closure. Typography: optional final lyric echo '{{closing_line}}'. Aspect Ratio: 16:9.

continuity_rule: Ensure continuity by matching character appearance, lighting style, and environmental tone with previous batch.
